channel.title: CVE Feed for ArmorX -- LisoMail

item.title: CVE-2020-3922|2024-08-04T07:52:19.964Z -- armorx -- lisomail
item.description: LisoMail, by ArmorX, allows SQL Injections, attackers can access the database without authentication via a URL parameter manipulation.
